blocks.name: subspopn
blocks.content: An open set is open in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: neificl
blocks.content: Neighborhoods are closed under finite intersection. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neificl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
} = {
  impl(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  mpdi(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  simprl(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))
  com3l(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  syl5(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c0, ctop), wi(wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wal(hs0, wi(w3a(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ctop), wal(hs0, wi(w3a(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))), wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))))
  ralrimivv(hs0, hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  3expib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  innei(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  fiint(hs0, hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))
  spcgv(hs0, c1, cfn, wi(w3a(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wi(wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w3a(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w3a(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), w3a(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c1, emptycls)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cfn)
  bitri(w3a(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn)), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), w3a(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  3ancomb(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn))
  3anass(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))
  eleq1d(cint(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2), cint(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  inteq(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(cint(c1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neificl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2))∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))→ ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
} = {
  impl(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), (c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  mpdi(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)), ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ∈ Fin)
  simprl(c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅)
  com3l(c0 ∈ Top, (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)), c1 ∈ Fin, ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  syl5(c1 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Top, ((c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))→ ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), ∀(hs0,((hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))))
  sylib(c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0,((hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))), ∀(hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), ∀(hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2),(hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈((nei ` c0)` c2))))
  ralrimivv(hs0, hs1, ((nei ` c0)` c2), ((nei ` c0)` c2), c0 ∈ Top, (hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  3expib(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), hs1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (hs0 ⋂ hs1)∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  innei(c0, hs0, c2, hs1)
  fiint(hs0, hs1, ((nei ` c0)` c2))
  spcgv(hs0, c1, cfn, ((hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋂ hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)), ((c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))→ ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin), ⋂ hs0 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2), (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)), ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2))
  syl6bb(hs0 = c1, (hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ hs0 ≠ ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin), (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)), (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), hs0 ≠ ∅, hs0 ∈ Fin, c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, ((nei ` c0)` c2))
  neeq1(hs0, c1, emptycls)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, cfn)
  bitri((c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)), (c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧ c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  3ancomb(c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin)
  3anass(c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2), c1 ∈ Fin, c1 ≠ ∅)
  eleq1d(⋂ hs0, ((nei ` c0)` c2), ⋂ c1, hs0 = c1)
  inteq(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(((nei ` c0)` c2))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs0.c(((nei ` c0)` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c1 ⊆((nei ` c0)` c2)∧(c1 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))→ ⋂ c1 ∈((nei ` c0)` c2)))
}

blocks.name: lpss2
blocks.content: Limit points of a subset are limit points of the larger set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
